price: Ne Ismail ne Al-Yasa’a (Elisa), ne Yuunus (Yona) ne Lut; wͻn mu biara Yε’de (adom) dom wͻn kyεn amansan a aka no nyinaa.
arabic: وَإِسۡمَٰعِيلَ وَٱلۡيَسَعَ وَيُونُسَ وَلُوطٗاۚ وَكُلّٗا فَضَّلۡنَا عَلَى ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wa-is'māʿīla wal-yasaʿa wayūnusa walūṭan wakullan faḍḍalnā ʿalā al-ʿālamīna
